alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hardee, Manatee, eastern Hillsborough, western Polk and north central Sarasota Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Lake Louisa to near Plant City to 7 miles north of Memphis. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Sarasota, Bradenton, Plant City, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fish Hawk, Greater Sun Center, West Samoset, The Meadows, Medulla, Parrish, Kensington Park, Lakewood Ranch, Ellenton, Fussels Corner, and Combee Settlement. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk
